Name: Dell
Description: An American multinational known for its desktops, laptops, servers, and storage solutions, especially for businesses.

Name: HP (Hewlett-Packard)
Description: Specializes in personal computing, enterprise products like servers, storage, and printers.

Name: Lenovo
Description: A Chinese multinational, one of the worldâ€™s largest PC manufacturers, known for its ThinkPad laptops.

Name: Apple
Description: Known for its high-end laptops (MacBook), desktops (iMac), and devices like iPads and iPhones, with a focus on design and user experience.

Name: Asus
Description: A Taiwanese company that manufactures computers, laptops, and motherboards, popular in the gaming and business world.

Name: Microsoft
Description: Known for its Surface tablets, laptops, and enterprise hardware, and its Windows operating system.

Name: Samsung
Description: A South Korean conglomerate that manufactures PCs, mobile phones, and other electronic devices.

Name: Huawei
Description: A Chinese multinational that manufactures telecommunications equipment and consumer electronics like smartphones.

Name: ZTE
Description: A Chinese company focused on telecommunications equipment and systems, including 5G technology.

Name: Adobe
Description: Known for its suite of creative software products, including Photoshop, Illustrator, and Acrobat.

Name: SAP
Description: A German multinational that produces enterprise software for managing business operations and customer relations.

Name: Xerox
Description: Known for its photocopiers, printers, and document management systems, originating from the U.S.

Name: Brother
Description: A Japanese company specializing in printers, multifunction devices, and label printers.

Name: Epson
Description: A global leader in printing and imaging products, especially known for inkjet printers and

Name: Kyocera
Description: A Japanese multinational known for durable printers, copiers, and multifunctional devices.

Name: Toyota
Description: A Japanese multinational brand known for producing reliable, fuel-efficient vehicles and advanced hybrid technology.

Name: Ford
Description: An American car manufacturer famous for its trucks, SUVs, and the iconic Mustang.

Name: BMW
Description: A German luxury vehicle brand, recognized for performance, innovation, and premium cars and motorcycles.

Name: Mercedes-Benz
Description: Another German brand, renowned for luxury vehicles, buses, and trucks, and cutting-edge safety technology.

Name: Nissan
Description: A Japanese brand that produces a wide range of vehicles, including electric cars (like the Nissan Leaf) and trucks.
